title: Gamers honoured by police for helping distressed woman

embed.description: Five League of Legends gamers from West Auckland feel like legends themselves, being presented with police bravery awards. Barrie Olsen, Jason Sloane, Konrad Berking, Maina Papalii and Rob Lew were honoured on Tuesday at Waitakere Police station for their role in apprehending an offender during an attempted carjacking in April in New Lynn.

replies.body: Yes this is totally an impressive effort! They took a personal risk to stop someone being hurt. Much respect.
But did they get penalized for being afk, that is the question.
